title: Mode not supported
body: i had a problem with my game so i uninstalled then installed it but when i got in a game i had a a black screen saying mode not supported so i did some googling and opened my game.cfg file and made sure my game res matches my monitors res even and still got the same result so i tried changing window mode from 0 to 1 and the game worked in windowed mode but still not playable so i went to video setting and tried to change it to full screen with the lowest res and still got mode not supported pls help me!

replies.body: This is an issue that we're investigated, and updated will be provided through the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  In the meantime, try pressing Alt+Enter in-game as a workaround.  Also, try changing your WindowMode to equal 2.  Let me know if that fixes it for you!
Thank you so much for your help
